reviewText:
Larry Anderson's relaxed manner and excellent video shots clearly instruct the application of 11 great "Jaw-Dropping" routines you can do with just a little preparation. Most of the principles can be applied to a variety of routines you can develop and adapt to your own personality and situation.

The basic approach in the video is to show the jaw-dropper in action followed by a very careful and detailed explanation and a re-do of the illusion. Beginners and more advanced magicians will find lots to work from on this tape.
This is a great video for learning magic! It is so easy to to follow and the tricks are great!
